title: mod崩溃了帮个忙好吗？
author: 纸X飞X机
txt_content:
下面是错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I bet Cylons wouldn't have this problem.
Time: 13-11-8 下午10:42
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail
cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: ic2.api.recipe.IMachineRecipeManager.addRecipe(Lnet/minecraft/item/ItemStack;Ljava/lang/Object;)V

replies.author: 纸X飞X机
replies.txt_content:
654982492 发表于 2013-11-9 20:23 
不看都知道是mod冲突
问题是哪个mod？！

纸X飞X机 发表于 2013-11-10 15:14 
问题是哪个mod？！
把“我的工厂”删了
应该只有这个办法简单，如果要改冲突物品的话，很麻烦
